bibl.title: Kings or God? Towards an Anthropology of Text.
bibl.note: Attempts to extrapolate theological and social tendencies from a textual variation found in the ""Unknown Gospel"" [P. Egerton 2 + P. Köln VI, 255 (= van Haelst 586; LDAB 4736)].

bibl.title: Textual Variation: Theological and Social Tendencies? Papers from the Fifth Birmingham Colloquium on the Textual Criticism of the New Testament

bibl.seg: Richard Goode, Kings or God? Towards an Anthropology of Text.

H.A.G. Houghton & D.C. Parker (edd.), Textual Variation: Theological and Social Tendencies? Papers from the Fifth Birmingham Colloquium on the Textual Criticism of the New Testament = Text and Studies. Third Series. 6 (Piscataway, NJ, 2008) pp. 25-34.
Attempts to extrapolate theological and social tendencies from a textual variation found in the ""Unknown Gospel"" [P. Egerton 2 + P. Köln VI, 255 (= van Haelst 586; LDAB 4736)].
